import React, { useState } from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import { Row, Col, Breadcrumb ,Icon,Affix} from 'antd' import Header from '../components/Header' import Author from '../components/Author' import Advert from '../components/Advert' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import '../static/style/pages/detailed.css' import axios from 'axios' import marked from 'marked' import hljs from "highlight.js"; import 'highlight.js/styles/monokai-sublime.css'; import MarkNav from 'markdown-navbar' import 'markdown-navbar/dist/navbar.css' const Detailed = () => { const renderer = new marked.Renderer(); marked.setOptions({ renderer: renderer, gfm: true, pedantic: false, sanitize: false, tables: true, breaks: false, smartLists: true, smartypants: false, highlight: function (code) { return hljs.highlightAuto(code).value; } }); let html = marked(props.article_content) return(
博客详情页 //
首页 列表 xxxx
React实战视频教程-技术胖Blog开发(更新08集)
2019-06-28 视频教程 5498人
文章目录
) } Detailed.getInitialProps = async(context)=>{ let id =context.query.id const promise = new Promise((resolve)=>{ axios('http://127.0.0.1:7001/default/getArticleById/'+id).then( (res)=>{ resolve(res.data.data[0]) } ) }) return await promise } export default Detailed
